title: Fix JAVA_MEM_OPTS cannot be ajdusted to Cgroup limits for Docker Envi…
body:
…ronment.

Signed-off-by: xuanyuan300 <xuanyuan300@gmail.com>

Fixes #20704 

Changes proposed in this pull request:
-  Added CGROUP_MEM_OPTS and JAVA_MEM_COMMON_OPTS to environment.

CGROUP_MEM_OPTS used to container environment, the default value is:
-XX:InitialRAMPercentage=80.0
-XX:MaxRAMPercentage=80.0
-XX:MinRAMPercentage=80.0

JAVA_MEM_COMMON_OPTS used to non-container environment, the default value is
-Xmx2g
-Xms2g
-Xmn1g
